---
name: nPassim
description: Create a simple one page for all your links. 
website: https://www.npassim.com/
github: https://www.npassim.com/1?
techstack:
  - label: HTML
  - label: CSS
  - label: JavaScript
  - label: Vue
  - label: Vercel
---

nPassim is a way to create one pages/mini-websites for lay people. 
It's similar to beacons.ai or Linktree but instead of storing user's information in a database, I base encode all data, and then add that to a URL param.   
My next move it to build a URL shortener. 

Example: Check out the "talks by me button" in my About me section. Or click on the "github" button above.

Since I'm base encoding such a large string (see above), my next move is building a URL shortener. More on that soon.
This could be a cool way to create a little mini-dating profile site. The original inspo actually came from this tweet: https://x.com/r00k/status/1804548900381946280
